title: Complete Daily Construction Report
description: At the end of the day, a field engineer needs to complete the daily report, summarizing work completed, resources used, and any issues.

tasks.description: Open a new daily report for the current date.
Enter the number of personnel from each contractor that were on site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly logs the manpower for the day.

tasks.description: Describe the main construction activities completed and note any delays or safety incidents, then submit the report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a summary of the day's work and submits the report to the project manager.
